results.title: Metformin preconditioning protects against myocardial stunning and preserves protein translation in a mouse model of cardiac arrest
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ preconditioning protects against @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Stunning</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017682 @@@myocardial stunning@@@ and preserves protein translation in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ model of @DISEASE_Heart_Arrest @DISEASE_MESH:D006323 @@@cardiac arrest@@@

results.title: Metformin attenuates ischemia/reperfusion-induced apoptosis of cardiac cells by downregulation of p53/microRNA-34a via activation of SIRT1.
results.text_hl: In the in vivo @DISEASE_Reperfusion_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D015427 @@@I/R@@@ model using Sprague-Dawley @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ reduced the area of damaged @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Stunning</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017682 @@@myocardium@@@ and serum creatine MB isoform (CKMB) activity resulting in protection of the @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Stunning</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017682 @@@myocardium@@@.

results.title: Evaluating the cardioprotective effect of metformin on myocardial ischemia-reperfusion injury using dynamic 18F-FDG micro-PET/CT imaging
results.text_hl: The molecular mechanisms of protective effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@GENE_MET @GENE_24553 @@@Met@@@) on @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Stunning</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017682 @@@ischemic myocardium@@@ have not been fully understood.

results.title: Metformin Attenuates Myocardial Ischemia-Reperfusion Injury through the AMPK-HMGCR-ROS Signaling Axis.
results.text_hl: Real-time quantitative polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR) and Western blot were used to detect mRNA and expression of the @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_78975 @@@Adenosine 5'-monophosphate-activated protein kinase@@@ (@GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_78975 @@@AMPK@@@) - @GENE_HMGCR @GENE_25675 @@@3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl-CoA reductase@@@ (@GENE_HMGCR @GENE_25675 @@@HMGCR@@@) signaling pathway, respectively. RESULTS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ treatment decreased the @DISEASE_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarct@@@ size and the activity of the myocardial enzyme profile, thus demonstrating protection of @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Stunning</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017682 @@@ischemic myocardium@@@.

citations.NLM: Zhu H, Zhu T, Dubiao D, Zhang X. Metformin Attenuates Myocardial Ischemia-Reperfusion Injury through the AMPK-HMGCR-ROS Signaling Axis. Kardiologiia. 2024 Oct 31;64(10):48-56. PMID: 39526518

results.title: Metformin improves cardiac functional recovery after ischemia in rats.
results.text_hl: This study clearly shows that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ acutely improves cardiac function after a mild @DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic incident@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Stunning</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017682 @@@stunning@@@) in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

results.title: Metformin prevents ischaemic ventricular fibrillation in metabolically normal pigs.
results.text_hl: The anti-fibrillatory effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ was associated with attenuation of action potential shortening in @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Stunning</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017682 @@@ischaemic myocardium@@@ (p = 0.02) and attenuation of the difference in action potential duration between @DISEASE_Optic_Neuropathy_Ischemic @DISEASE_MESH:D018917 @@@ischaemic@@@ and non-@DISEASE_Optic_Neuropathy_Ischemic @DISEASE_MESH:D018917 @@@ischaemic@@@ regions (p < 0.001) compared with untreated controls.

citations.NLM: Lu L, Ye S, Scalzo RL, Reusch JEB, Greyson CR, Schwartz GG. Metformin prevents ischaemic ventricular fibrillation in metabolically normal pigs. Diabetologia. 2017 Aug;60(8):1550-1558. PMID: 28497164

results.title: Metformin alters the insulin signaling pathway in ischemic cardiac tissue in a swine model of metabolic syndrome.
results.text_hl: Histologic analysis demonstrated increased expression of glucose transporter 1 at the plasma membrane in the OHCM group, but there was no difference in cardiomyocyte @CHEMICAL_Glycogen @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006003 @@@glycogen@@@ stores among groups. CONCLUSIONS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ treatment in the context of @DISEASE_Metabolic_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D024821 @@@metabolic syndrome@@@ and @DISEASE_Myocardial_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D017202 @@@myocardial ischemia@@@ dramatically upregulates the @GENE_INS @GENE_397415 @@@insulin@@@ signaling pathway in chronically @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Stunning</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017682 @@@ischemic myocardium@@@, which is at the crossroads of known metabolic and survival benefits of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Elmadhun NY, Lassaletta AD, Chu LM, Sellke FW. Metformin alters the insulin signaling pathway in ischemic cardiac tissue in a swine model of metabolic syndrome. J Thorac Cardiovasc Surg. 2013 Jan;145(1):258-65; discussion 265-6. PMID: 23083540
